meanings.definition: A cloth used for washing dishes or cleaning surfaces.
meanings.sent1: I always keep a stack of washrags under the sink for cleaning.
meanings.sent2: My mom asked me to grab a washrag to wipe down the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy thought the washrags were toys and dragged them all over the house.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like washrags, wiping away the doubts in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The colorful washrags brightened up the dull chore of cleaning.

meanings.definition: A small towel used for personal hygiene.
meanings.sent1: After swimming, I grabbed a washrag to dry off.
meanings.sent2: She packed a washrag in her gym bag for after her workout.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a never-ending string of washrags out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a comforting washrag on a difficult day.
meanings.sent5: The soft washrag felt gentle against her skin after a long day.
